name: HomeTRL
description:
Be a bug, collect food, escape death and practice some typing!

HomeTRL is an arcade game where you are a little bug who must collect food for it’s family, who lives in the Control key of a gamer’s keyboard. Press a key in your own keyboard to jump to that key in the game!

Submited for the GMTK Jam 2020.

 

Game Rules

Movement - Any letter or number in the alphanumeric keyboard! (QWERTY)
Pause/Options - Esc

The CTRL key is your safe zone. When there, fingers no longer fall but rythm does not increase

Being outside the CTRL key may be dangerous, but it makes points appear and collecting consecutive points duplicates your score multiplier.

Carrying points must be held home to secure them and make them appear in the final core screen. Secured points are your final score.

 

Developed by Xibalboys:
Alejandro Núñez - Programming
Alejandro Trinidad - 3D Modelling and texturing
Isaac (Isi) López - 3D Modelling and texturing, UI Design
Llibert Sans - 3D Modelling and texturing, Animations
GhoulMage - Music and programming support
Sergio Sánchez - Programming

Special thanks:
Guillem Ruiz

 

If the Installer doesn't work, please download the .zip file and use the executable file.
